1 #include <ros/ros.h>
2 #include <std_srvs/Trigger.h>
3 
4 #define NODE_NAME "panda_bin_picking_client"
5 
6 #define CAPTURE_SERVICE "/panda_bin_picking/capture"
7 #define DETECT_SERVICE "/panda_bin_picking/detect"
8 #define PLAN_APPROACH_SERVICE "/panda_bin_picking/plan_approach"
9 #define APPROACH_SERVICE "/panda_bin_picking/approach"
10 #define PLAN_PICK_SERVICE "/panda_bin_picking/plan_pick"
11 #define PICK_SERVICE "/panda_bin_picking/pick"
12 #define PLAN_LIFT_SERVICE "/panda_bin_picking/plan_lift"
13 #define LIFT_SERVICE "/panda_bin_picking/lift"
14 #define PLAN_LIFT_ALT_SERVICE "/panda_bin_picking/plan_lift_alt"
15 #define LIFT_ALT_SERVICE "/panda_bin_picking/lift_alt"
16 #define PLAN_PLACE_SERVICE "/panda_bin_picking/plan_place"
17 #define PLACE_SERVICE "/panda_bin_picking/place"
18 
24 static void error(const char* msg);
30 static void stateMachine(ros::NodeHandle& node_handle);
31 
40 int main(int argc, char **argv)
41 {
42  ros::init(argc, argv, NODE_NAME);
43  ros::NodeHandle node_handle;
44  ros::AsyncSpinner async_spinner(1);
45  async_spinner.start();
46 
47  stateMachine(node_handle);
48 
49  ros::shutdown();
50  return 0;
51 }
52 
53 static void stateMachine(ros::NodeHandle& node_handle)
54 {
55  // all possible state machine states
56  enum class State : uint8_t {
57  Home = 0,
58  Capture = 1,
59  Detect = 2,
60  PlanApproach = 3,
61  Approach = 4,
62  PlanPick = 5,
63  Pick = 6,
64  PlanLift = 7,
65  Lift = 8,
66  PlanLiftAlt = 9,
67  LiftAlt = 10,
68  PlanPlace = 11,
69  Place = 12,
70  Finished = 13
71  };
72 
73  // each state mapped to its description
74  std::map<State, std::string> state_to_desc = {
75  {State::Capture, "capture pointclouds"},
76  {State::Detect, "detect grasp poses"},
77  {State::PlanApproach, "plan approach path"},
78  {State::Approach, "execute approach path"},
79  {State::PlanPick, "plan pick path"},
80  {State::Pick, "execute pick path"},
81  {State::PlanLift, "plan lift path"},
82  {State::Lift, "execute lift path"},
83  {State::PlanLiftAlt, "plan alternative lift path"},
84  {State::LiftAlt, "execute alternative lift path"},
85  {State::PlanPlace, "plan place path"},
86  {State::Place, "execute place path"},
87  {State::Finished, "finish"},
88  };
89 
90  // start in home state
91  State state = State::Home;
92 
93  std_srvs::Trigger srv;
94 
95  // actual state machine
96  while (true) {
97  switch (state) {
98  case State::Home:
99  {
100  state = State::Capture;
101  break;
102  }
103  case State::Capture:
104  {
105  ros::service::waitForService(CAPTURE_SERVICE);
106  ros::service::call(CAPTURE_SERVICE, srv);
107  if (!srv.response.success) {
108  error("capture failed");
109  }
110  state = State::Detect;
111  break;
112  }
113  case State::Detect:
114  {
115  ros::service::call(DETECT_SERVICE, srv);
116  if (!srv.response.success) {
117  ROS_INFO("no objects left to grasp");
118  ros::shutdown();
119  return;
120  }
121  state = State::PlanApproach;
122  break;
123  }
124  case State::PlanApproach:
125  {
126  ros::service::call(PLAN_APPROACH_SERVICE, srv);
127  if (!srv.response.success) {
128  error("approach failed");
129  }
130  state = State::Approach;
131  break;
132  }
133  case State::Approach:
134  {
135  ros::service::call(APPROACH_SERVICE, srv);
136  if (!srv.response.success) {
137  state = State::PlanApproach;
138  }
139  else {
140  state = State::PlanPick;
141  }
142  break;
143  }
144  case State::PlanPick:
145  {
146  ros::service::call(PLAN_PICK_SERVICE, srv);
147  if (!srv.response.success) {
148  state = State::PlanApproach;
149  }
150  else {
151  state = State::Pick;
152  }
153  break;
154  }
155  case State::Pick:
156  {
157  ros::service::call(PICK_SERVICE, srv);
158  if (!srv.response.success) {
159  error("pick failed");
160  }
161  else {
162  state = State::PlanLift;
163  }
164  break;
165  }
166  case State::PlanLift:
167  {
168  ros::service::call(PLAN_LIFT_SERVICE, srv);
169  if (!srv.response.success) {
170  //state = State::PlanLiftAlt;
171  error("plan lift failed");
172  }
173  else {
174  state = State::Lift;
175  }
176  break;
177  }
178  case State::Lift:
179  {
180  ros::service::call(LIFT_SERVICE, srv);
181  if (!srv.response.success) {
182  error("lift failed");
183  }
184  else {
185  state = State::PlanPlace;
186  }
187  break;
188  }
189  case State::PlanLiftAlt:
190  {
191  ros::service::call(PLAN_LIFT_ALT_SERVICE, srv);
192  if (!srv.response.success) {
193  error("plan lift alt failed");
194  }
195  else {
196  state = State::LiftAlt;
197  }
198  break;
199  }
200  case State::LiftAlt:
201  {
202  ros::service::call(LIFT_ALT_SERVICE, srv);
203  if (!srv.response.success) {
204  error("lift alt failed");
205  }
206  else {
207  state = State::PlanPlace;
208  }
209  break;
210  }
211  case State::PlanPlace:
212  {
213  ros::service::call(PLAN_PLACE_SERVICE, srv);
214  if (!srv.response.success) {
215  error("plan place failed");
216  }
217  else {
218  state = State::Place;
219  }
220  break;
221  }
222  case State::Place:
223  {
224  ros::service::call(PLACE_SERVICE, srv);
225  if (!srv.response.success) {
226  error("place failed");
227  }
228  else {
229  state = State::Finished;
230  }
231  break;
232  }
233  case State::Finished:
234  {
235  state = State::Capture;
236  break;
237  }
238  }
239 
240  // wait for enter to change state (quit if input is 'q')
241  ROS_INFO("Press enter to %s", state_to_desc.at(state).c_str());
242  if(std::cin.get() == 'q')
243  error("aborted");
244  }
245 }
246 
247 static void error(const char* msg)
248 {
249  // print error description
250  ROS_ERROR(msg);
251 
252  // shutdown node
253  ros::shutdown();
254  exit(1);
255 }
